page.title: 09FLY-OVER CONSTRUCTION
page.content: Interview with site manager,Mr Finlay it is a well paid job and for some of the men a large amount is earned.It will help the traffic in the area.For the twenty or so men and the five vehicles,it will take about eighteen months to finish.It is a long job each day most men work eleven and a-half hours.The most difficult job is digging holes for the flyover.They didn't have a license for driving an earth mover and there is no easy way to build the flyover .Hopefully it will be finished by Christmas 1985 although the heavy rain has caused delays.At the moment the flyover has no effect on the school,but when it is in use it will will be noisy and dusty so the local people believe.
